name: 长的江电影《长江图》主题歌 / The Long River
lyric:
电影《长江图》主题歌
作词/作曲：左小祖咒
编曲/吉他：刘巨然
贝斯：李强
和音：猫柯希
混音工程师：李士先

请等一等，等一等
太不好意思了
知道吗？这样吧，我的朋友
请你告诉她，当她离我而去
墙上所有的照片，相框
包括她唤醒我的闹钟
请都拿走我不要回忆了
但我怀念它们，所以又要回来了

老是打搅你，真是真的不好意思了
我不知道她现在在哪儿？
她心地好，玩得高兴把裤子输了
所有的人都入睡了，现在差不多是凌晨三点多了
再过两个时辰旭日在渔民的后棚升起
请你回去吧，你说得对极了

谢谢你逗我玩儿，我时常感到我要杀人
她因打我，我又打了她，坐了监狱
穷人真的不怕死吗，真的吗？
真像《街头斗士》唱的吗：
“是的，一个穷小子又能干啥？
除了当一名摇滚歌手
因为在这昏昏欲睡的城市
没有人适合作一名街头斗士，没有！”
除非你是滚石，你是一块滚石

The Long River

Movie<Crosscurrent> Theme Song
lyrics/Composer: Zuoxiao Zuzhou
Arrangement/Guitar: Juran Liu
Bess: Qiang Li
Chord：Maxine
Mixing Engineering: Shixian Li

Wait please wait, for one second
I’m so sorry but
You know what? Can you, my good buddy
Just tell her that, when she decides to leave
All the photos on the wall, the frames
The alarm she sets to wake me up
Just take them all. No memory is needed at all
But I can’t let go as yet, so here they are, sitting by

Keep coming back to you, really I’m sorry truly I am
But I have no idea, where she at, at this time
A good heart she has, but when she games, even pants are lost
Every soul is now asleep and rested. It’s almost 3 in the morning.
Two hours from now, the early-morning sun will be rising from the back of the fishing town.
Please go back now. You’ve made your point.

Thanks for all the teasing. I always feel the urge of murdering.
For she hit me, I hit her right back. Jail time’s been served.
The poor ain’t afraid of death right? is it really?
Is it really like in Street Fighting Man:
“Well, what can a poor boy do
Except to sing for a rock 'n' roll band
Cause in sleepy London town
There's no place for a street fighting man. No”
Unless you are the Rolling Stones, you are a rolling stone.
